about.summary: Javascript Animation exporter for matplotlib and IPython.

name: jsanimation
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.1" %}
{% set commit = "b14771b6b6aa4429ca19c93aba8c315bf63ce227" %}

package:
    name: jsanimation
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: {{ commit }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/jakevdp/JSAnimation/archive/{{ commit }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 60be390282a76ef2681a11f29a4c4af57003c6bf81118dda9e512cce415761db

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install

requirements:
    build:
        - python
    run:
        - python
        - matplotlib

test:
    imports:
        - JSAnimation

about:
    home: http://github.com/jakevdp/JSAnimation
    license: BSD 2-Clause
    summary: 'Javascript Animation exporter for matplotlib and IPython.'


extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
        - rsignell-usgs
